dbl.name: Google Nest Doorbell (Wired)
dbl.description: Nest Hello is now the Nest Doorbell (wired); no matter which name is on the box, you'll find the same great product inside

dbl.name: EKEN Smart Video Doorbell
dbl.description: Truly Wire-Free Design: Engineered for 2.4G Wi-Fi (5G Wi-Fi not supported), this doorbell camera comes with a complimentary Doorbell Chime, ensuring you never miss a visitor, wherever you are.

dbl.name: REOLINK Video Doorbell PoE Camera
dbl.description: 5MP Super HD Image in 180° Diagonal: Find the right position for your doorbell with its 15° wedge kit and enjoy the super wide field of view. Incredible 5MP HD, with advanced HDR/3D DNR and distortion correction technologies, brings you sharp and detailed images even in low light conditions.

dbl.name: Google Nest Doorbell (Wireless)
dbl.description: The Nest Doorbell has built-in intelligence and can tell the difference between a person, package, animal, and vehicles and send you an alert in the Google Home app[1], no subscription required.

dbl.name: REOLINK Doorbell WiFi Camera
dbl.description: 5MP Super HD Day and Night! Incredible 5MP HD, with advanced HDR/3D DNR and distortion correction technologies, brings you sharp and detailed images even in low light conditions.

dlk.name: Philips Smart Lock
dlk.description: User-friendly : 4 ways to unlock, both convenient and adaptable.

dlk.name: Philips Keyless Entry Door Lock with Keypad
dlk.description: Convenient keyless entry: This electronic deadbolt offers 20 access codes and 50 fingerprints for family use, allowing you to enter your home without mechanical keys. (No internet required)

dlk.name: Veise Smart Lock
dlk.description: 7-in-1 Smart Door Lock: Access your smart lock via Fingerprint + App + Web portal + Fobs +Code + eKey sharing + Mechanical key.

dlk.name: Veise Smart Lock (Keyless Entry)
dlk.description: Keyless Entry Door Lock: The smart lock has a 5 in 1 access method, APP + Fobs + password + key + thumb turn.

dlk.name: Wyze Lock Bolt
dlk.description: Fingerprint Unlock: Gone are the days of fumbling for keys. Wyze Lock Bolt recognizes your fingerprint and unlocks the door in under a second.

spkr.name: Echo Dot (5th Gen, 2022 release)
spkr.description: OUR BEST SOUNDING ECHO DOT YET - Enjoy an improved audio experience compared to any previous Echo Dot with Alexa for clearer vocals, deeper bass and vibrant sound in any room.

spkr.name: Echo Pop
spkr.description: INTRODUCING ECHO POP - This compact smart speaker with Alexa features full sound that's great for bedrooms and small spaces. Small enough to blend in and mighty enough to stand out.

spkr.name: Bose Home Speaker 500
spkr.description: SOUND PERFORMANCE: Fill any room with impressive wall-to-wall stereo sound from a single speaker

spkr.name: iHome iBT158 Smart Bluetooth Speaker
spkr.description: 12 HOURS OF MUSIC ON THE GO - Recharge your speaker and enjoy up to 12 hours of non-stop music playing time.

spkr.name: Echo Studio
spkr.description: ENJOY AN IMMERSIVE AUDIO EXPERIENCE - Echo Studio now features spatial audio processing technology for a wider and more immersive audio experience.

lght.name: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance Smart Light
lght.description: Starter kit includes one Hue Bridge and two Hue White and color ambiance smart, color changing 60W / 9.5W A19 light bulbs suitable for most fixtures

lght.name: Govee Smart LED Light Bars
lght.description: Exciting Lighting Experience: Adopts innovative RGBICWW technology to display rainbow-like light effects created from 16 millions colors.

lght.name: Govee Smart Light Bulbs
lght.description: 16 Million DIY Colors: Govee smart light bulbs own millions of color and 54 preset scene modes, you can explore your favored one or pick one suits your moods most, bringing yourself a real fantastic lighting experience

lght.name: Kasa Smart LED Light Strip
lght.description: [High brightness and saturation] The 16.4ft LED light strip features customization up to 16 million colors with high brightness and saturation for the best lighting throughout your home.

lght.name: Philips Hue 2-Pack Bluetooth Smart Lightstrip
lght.description: Includes two Hue 6-foot LED light strip base kits with two plugs; perfect for mood lighting anywhere in your home; get started out of the box with Bluetooth

trmst.name: Amazon Smart Thermostat
trmst.description: Smart upgrade - Amazon Smart Thermostat is an easy way to switch from a traditional thermostat and help reduce energy usage.

trmst.name: Google Nest Thermostat
trmst.description: ENERGY STAR certified smart thermostat for home that helps you save energy and stay comfortable.

trmst.name: Google Nest Learning Thermostat
trmst.description: No more programming: With Auto-Schedule, the Google Nest Learning Thermostat learns from you and programs itself.

trmst.name: Honeywell Home Wi-Fi Smart Color Thermostat
trmst.description: COMFORT COMES IN YOUR COLOR. Personalize your Wi-Fi Smart Color Programmable Thermostat to fit your décor.

trmst.name: Honeywell Home Wi-Fi Programmable Thermostat
trmst.description: ENERGY STAR certified. Help save energy, track your heating and cooling with monthly energy reports and get personalized tips on reducing energy use.

accessory.name: Trushome Doorbell Mount
accessory.description: Compatible With Multiple Wireless Doorbells: Trushome doorbell mount is used for different sizes of doorbells by filling the inside with sponges of different thicknesses.
